overview.heading: âš™ï¸ Common Sports Bet Types
overview.data:
Understanding the different types of sports bets is essential for every bettor. Here's a quick rundown:
â¤ Straight Bet / Single Bet: Bet on the outcome of a single match or event (e.g., winner, draw).
â¤ System Bet: Combines multiple bets in a way that allows partial winnings even if not all selections are correct.
â¤ Parlay / Accumulator Bet: Bundles multiple bets into one. All must win for a payout, but the combined odds can lead to big rewards.
â¤ Moneyline: Betting on who wins â€” simple and widely used, especially in US sports.
â¤ Point Spread (Spread Betting): Bet on a team to win within a point margin â€” commonly used in basketball and football.
â¤ Totals (Over/Under): Bet whether the combined score will be over or under a line set by the sportsbook.
â¤ Teasers & Pleasers: Adjust point spreads for adjusted odds â€” teasers lower risk, pleasers increase payout potential.
